blocks.name: nextPage
blocks.description: Use this block to paginate through results.

blocks.name: createAttachment
blocks.description: Creates an attachment

blocks.name: getBasecamps
blocks.description: Returns a list of active Basecamps visible to the current user sorted by most recently created Basecamp first.

args.name: status
args.info: When set to `archived` or `trashed`, will return archived or trashed Basecamps visible to the current user.

blocks.name: getSingleBasecamp
blocks.description: Returns the Basecamp with the given ID, granted they have access to it.

blocks.name: createBasecamp
blocks.description: Creates a new Basecamp.

blocks.name: updateBasecamp
blocks.description: Will allow updating of a Basecamp's name and description.

blocks.name: deleteBasecamp
blocks.description: Will mark the Basecamp with the given ID as trashed.

blocks.name: getCampfires
blocks.description: Returns a list of all active Campfires visible to the current user.

blocks.name: getSingleCampfire
blocks.description: Return the Campfire with ID `campfireId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getCampfireLines
blocks.description: Returns a list of Campfire lines of the Campfire with ID `campfireId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`

blocks.name: getCampfireLine
blocks.description: Returns the Campfire line with ID `lineId` in the Campfire with ID `campfireId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

blocks.name: createCampfireLine
blocks.description: Creates a line in the Campfire with ID `campfireId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getChatbots
blocks.description: Return all the chatbots from the account with the line URL for the campfire with id `campfireId` on the basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getSingleChatbot
blocks.description: Returns the chatbot with an ID of `botId` with the line URL from the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

blocks.name: createChatbot
blocks.description: Creates a chatbot on the account and returns the new chatbot with the lines URL from the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

args.name: serviceName
args.info: Chatbot name, which will be used to invoke queries and commands on interactive bots.

args.name: commandUrl
args.info: HTTPS url that Basecamp should call when the bot is addressed

blocks.name: updateChatbot
blocks.description: Allows changing the service name and commandURL of the chatbot with an ID of `botId` in the Basecamp with ID `botId`.

args.name: serviceName
args.info: Chatbot name, which will be used to invoke queries and commands on interactive bots.

args.name: commandUrl
args.info: HTTPS url that Basecamp should call when the bot is addressed

blocks.name: deleteChatbot
blocks.description: Deletes the chatbot with an ID of `botId` across the account.

blocks.name: getClientApprovals
blocks.description: Returns a list of client approvals in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getSingleClientApproval
blocks.description: Returns the client approval with an ID of `approvalId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getClientCorrespondences
blocks.description: Returns a list of client correspondences in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getSingleClientCorrespondence
blocks.description: return the client correspondence with an ID of `correspondenceId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getClientReplies
blocks.description: return a paginated list of client replies in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId` and the recording with ID of `recordingId`.

blocks.name: getSingleClientReply
blocks.description: return the client reply with an ID of `replyId` for the recording with an ID of `recordingId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getComments
blocks.description: Return a list of active comments in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId` and the recording with ID of `recordingId`.

blocks.name: getSingleComment
blocks.description: Returns the comment with an ID of `commentId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: createComment
blocks.description: Publishes a comment in the Basecamp with ID `commentId` and under the recording with an ID of `recordingId`.

blocks.name: updateComment
blocks.description: Allows changing content of the message with an ID of `commentId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getRecordings
blocks.description: Return a paginated list of records for the given type of recording.

args.name: bucket
args.info: Single or comma separated list of Basecamp IDs. Default: All active Basecamps visible to the current user.

blocks.name: deleteRecording
blocks.description: mark the recording with an ID of `recordingId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId` as trashed.

blocks.name: getDocuments
blocks.description: Returns a list of active documents in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId` and the vault with ID of `vaultId`.

blocks.name: getSingleDocument
blocks.description: Return the document with an ID of `documentId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: createDocument
blocks.description: Publishes a document in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId` and under the vault with an ID of `vaultId`.

blocks.name: updateSingleDocument
blocks.description: Allows changing the title and content of the document with an ID of `documentId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getEvents
blocks.description: Returns a list of events for the recording with an ID of `recordingId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getForwards
blocks.description: Returns a list of active forwards in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId` and the inbox with an ID of `inboxId`.

blocks.name: getSingleForward
blocks.description: Returns the forward with an ID of `forwardId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getInbox
blocks.description: Returns the inbox with an ID of `inboxId` for the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getMessageBoard
blocks.description: Returns the message board for the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getMessages
blocks.description: Returns a list of active messages in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId` and the message board with ID of `boardId`.

blocks.name: getSingleMessage
blocks.description: Returns the message with an ID of `messageId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: createMessage
blocks.description: Publishes a message in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId` and under the message board with an ID of `boardId`.

blocks.name: updateMessage
blocks.description: Allows changing the subject and content of the message with an ID of `messageId` in the Basecamp with ID `commentId`.

blocks.name: getAllPeople
blocks.description: Return all people visible to the current user.

blocks.name: getPeopleOnBasecamp
blocks.description: Returns all active people on the Basecamp with the given ID.

blocks.name: createBasecampAccess
blocks.description: Allows granting new people access to a Basecamp.

args.name: people
args.info: An array of new people with name and email_address properties, and optional title and company_name properties. See README for more info.

blocks.name: grantBasecampAccess
blocks.description: Allows granting existing people access to a Basecamp.

args.name: people
args.info: An array of people IDs. See README for more info.

blocks.name: revokeBasecampAccess
blocks.description: Allows revoking access from existing people.

args.name: people
args.info: An array of people IDs. See README for more info.

blocks.name: getPingablePeople
blocks.description: Returns all people on this Basecamp account who can be pinged.

blocks.name: getPerson
blocks.description: Returns the profile for the user with the given ID.

blocks.name: getMyInfo
blocks.description: Returns the current user's personal info.

blocks.name: getQuestionAnswers
blocks.description: Returns a list of answers in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId` and the question with ID of `questionId`.

blocks.name: getSingleQuestionAnswer
blocks.description: Returns the answer with an ID of `answerId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getQuestionnaire
blocks.description: Returns the questionnaire for the Basecamp with an ID of `questionnaireId`.

blocks.name: getQuestions
blocks.description: Return a list of questions in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId` and the questionnaire with ID of `questionnaireId`.

blocks.name: getSingleQuestion
blocks.description: Return the question with an ID of `questionId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getScheduleEntries
blocks.description: Return a paginated list of active schedule entries in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId` and the schedule with ID of `scheduleId`.

args.name: status
args.info: When set to `archived` or `trashed`, will return archived or trashed schedule entries that are in this schedule.

blocks.name: getSingleScheduleEntry
blocks.description: Return the schedule entry with an ID of `entryId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: createScheduleEntry
blocks.description: Creates a schedule entry in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId` and under the schedule with an ID of `scheduleId`.

args.name: summary
args.info: What this schedule entry is about

args.name: startsAt
args.info: Timestamp for when this schedule entry begins

args.name: endsAt
args.info: Timestamp for when this schedule entry ends

args.name: description
args.info: Containing more information about the schedule entry

args.name: participantIds
args.info: An array of people IDs that will participate in this entry

args.name: allDay
args.info: When set to `true`, the schedule entry will not have a specific start or end time, and instead will be held for the entire day or days denoted in `starts_at` and `ends_at`

args.name: notify
args.info: When set to `true`, will notify the participants about the entry

blocks.name: updateScheduleEntry
blocks.description: Allows changing of the schedule entry with an ID of `entryId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

args.name: summary
args.info: What this schedule entry is about

args.name: startsAt
args.info: Timestamp for when this schedule entry begins

args.name: endsAt
args.info: Timestamp for when this schedule entry ends

args.name: description
args.info: Containing more information about the schedule entry

args.name: participantIds
args.info: An array of people IDs that will participate in this entry

args.name: allDay
args.info: When set to `true`, the schedule entry will not have a specific start or end time, and instead will be held for the entire day or days denoted in `starts_at` and `ends_at`

args.name: notify
args.info: When set to `true`, will notify the participants about the entry

blocks.name: getSingleSchedule
blocks.description: Returns the schedule for the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getTemplates
blocks.description: Returns a list of active Templates visible to the current user sorted by most recently created Template first.

args.name: status
args.info: When set to `archived` or `trashed`, will return archived or trashed Templates visible to the current user.

blocks.name: getSingleTemplate
blocks.description: Returns the Template with the given ID, granted they have access to it.

blocks.name: createTemplate
blocks.description: Creates a new template.

blocks.name: updateTemplate
blocks.description: Allows updating of a Template's `name` and `description`.

blocks.name: deleteTemplate
blocks.description: Marks the Template with the given ID as trashed. Trashed Templates will be deleted from Basecamp 3 after 30 days.

blocks.name: getProjectConstruction
blocks.description: Return the current state of the project construction.

blocks.name: getToDoLists
blocks.description: Return a paginated list of active to-do lists in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId` and the to-do set with ID of `setId`.

blocks.name: getSingleToDoList
blocks.description: Returns the to-do list with an ID of `listId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: createToDoList
blocks.description: Creates a to-do list in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId` and under the to-do set with an ID of `setId`.

args.name: description
args.info: Containing information about the to-do list.

blocks.name: updateToDoList
blocks.description: Allows changing the name and description of the to-do list with an ID of `listId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

args.name: description
args.info: Containing information about the to-do list.

blocks.name: getToDos
blocks.description: Returns a list of active to-dos in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId` and the to-do list with ID of `listId`.

args.name: status
args.info: When set to `archived` or `trashed`, will return archived or trashed to-dos that are in this list.

args.name: completed
args.info: When set to true, will only return to-dos that are completed. Can be combined with the status parameter.

blocks.name: getSingleToDo
blocks.description: Return the to-do with an ID of `todoId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: createToDo
blocks.description: Creates a to-do in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId` and under the to-do list with an ID of `listId`.

args.name: assigneeIds
args.info: An array of people that will be assigned to this to-do.

args.name: notify
args.info: When set to `true`, will notify the assignees about being assigned.

args.name: dueOn
args.info: A `YYYY-mm-dd` date when the to-do should be completed.

args.name: startsOn
args.info: Allows the to-do to run from this date to the `dueOn` date.

blocks.name: updateToDo
blocks.description: Allows changing the to-do with an ID of `todoId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

args.name: assigneeIds
args.info: An array of people that will be assigned to this to-do.

args.name: notify
args.info: When set to `true`, will notify the assignees about being assigned.

args.name: dueOn
args.info: A `YYYY-mm-dd` date when the to-do should be completed.

args.name: startsOn
args.info: Allows the to-do to run from this date to the `dueOn` date.

blocks.name: completeToDo
blocks.description: Marks the to-do with an ID of `todoId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId` as completed.

blocks.name: uncompleteToDo
blocks.description: Marks the to-do with an ID of `todoId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId` as uncompleted.

blocks.name: repositionToDo
blocks.description: Allows changing the position of the to-do with an ID of `todoId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

args.name: position
args.info: Greater than or equal to one.

blocks.name: getToDoSet
blocks.description: Returns the to-do set for the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getUploads
blocks.description: Returns a paginated list of active uploads in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId` and the vault with ID of `vaultId`.

blocks.name: getSingleUpload
blocks.description: Returns the upload with an ID of `uploadId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: createUpload
blocks.description: Creates an upload in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId` and under the vault with an ID of `vaultId`.

args.name: baseName
args.info: An new file name for the upload.

blocks.name: updateUpload
blocks.description: Allows changing the `description` and `baseName` of the upload with an ID of `uploadId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

args.name: baseName
args.info: An new file name for the upload.

blocks.name: getVaults
blocks.description: Returns a list of vaults in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId` and the vault with ID of `vaultId`.

blocks.name: getSingleVault
blocks.description: Returns the vault with an ID of `vaultId` in the Basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: createVault
blocks.description: Creates a vault in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId` and under the vault with an ID of `vaultId`.

blocks.name: updateVault
blocks.description: Allows changing the title of the vault with an ID of `vaultId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getWebhooks
blocks.description: Returns all the webhooks from the basecamp with an ID of `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getSingleWebhook
blocks.description: Returns the webhook with an ID of `webhookId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

blocks.name: createWebhook
blocks.description: Creates a webhook in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

args.name: payloadUrl
args.info: Payload url for the `HTTPS` url that Basecamp should call.

args.name: types
args.info: An array of types, options given in the introduction.

blocks.name: updateWebhook
blocks.description: Allows changing the payload url and types of the webhook with an ID of `webhookId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

args.name: payloadUrl
args.info: Payload url for the `HTTPS` url that Basecamp should call.

args.name: types
args.info: An array of types, options given in the introduction.

args.name: active
args.info: Boolean whether this webhook should be matching.

blocks.name: deleteWebhook
blocks.description: Deletes the webhook with an ID of `webhookId` in the Basecamp with ID `basecampId`.

blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: Returns `accessToken`.

blocks.name: refreshAccessToken
blocks.description: Allows refresh accessToken.

blocks.name: getAuthorization
blocks.description: Returns Authorization information.
